INDICATOR_NAME: Cause of death, by communicable diseases and maternal, prenatal and nutrition conditions (% of total)
SOURCE_NOTE: Cause of death refers to the share of all deaths for all ages by underlying causes. Communicable diseases and maternal, prenatal and nutrition conditions include infectious and parasitic diseases, respiratory infections, and nutritional deficiencies such as underweight and stunting.
SOURCE_ORGANIZATION: Derived based on the data from WHO's Global Health Estimates.
